name: Juniper's Knot
description: Juniper's Knot is a short (~30 mins) kinetic novel about the meeting of a demon and a boy. A kinetic novel is a game that uses text, sound, and illustrations to tell a story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual-Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card Storage: 500 MB available space
